body.ab: ‹(351)› @@ || dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gro lung pa blo gros 'byung gnas kyi mdzad pa'i lam rim 'am bstan rim chen po bzhugs so ||

bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che la 'jug pa'i rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par [118a2] bshad pa || byang phyogs kyi rgyud kha ba can gyi ljongs su byung ba || bla ma rje btsun dam pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma'i ze 'bru spyi bos len pa || lung dang rigs pa'i gtsug lag dam pa rnams la yongs su sbyangs pa'i ngal ba mi dman zhing mi zhan la mi nyung byas pa ||
rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dge ba can || shAkya'i dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas zhes bya ba thub pa'i brtul zhugs la legs par gnas pas rang gi dran pa goms pa spel ba'i brjed byang tsam du nye bar sbyar ba rdzogs ||

rje klong rdol rin po che nas phran klong rdol drung yig la rje gro lung pa'i bstan rim chen po 'di'i par zhig byung na brko rogs gyis gsungs kyang || phran rang nyid sngon bsags kyis sbyin 'bras phra bas gser dngul sogs kyi mthun rkyen [118a6] 'dzoms dka' bas tshe 'dir 'grub pa'i re ba dang bral zhing ||
rje klong rdol bla ma'i nye gnas drung yig dam chos yar 'phel gyi rang gi blo gros kyi mig gi dog gnas gang shes thams cad gsar du bcos nas dag par bgyis pa dang ||

rje klong rdol bla ma'i drung yig 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad nas ngal ba chen pos lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas || bstan bcos 'di nyid la sogs pa'i rnam dkar dge ba'i phung po che chung ji snyed cig byas pa thams cad ma gyur nam [120b3] mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la || byams pa dang snying rje'i rtsa ba can gyis byang chub kyi sems rin po che myur du rgyud la skye ba'i rgyur 'gro bar gyur cig || dge ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi dug gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu dang [120b4] sdig pa bsags pa'i rgyu la mi 'gro bar shogs shig ||
